Hi,

Sounds like something a manager I used to have woul=
d love.  But what's the real value of it?
 
> There are also some new, very=
 interesting features
> to get more information from the junit reports!
> C=
heckit out !
> Just look at the sample at:
> http://junitour.sf.net

Sounds=
 like you are selling Viagra or something.  Very enthusiastic, though, I go=
tta admit.  What do you think are the very interesting features?

I checked=
 out the Web site yesterday.  I think that creating new Exceptions that imp=
lement a "UnitTestIncomplete" interface, throwing those exceptions to indic=
ate incomplete test* methods, and then using a custom style sheet to flag t=
hose results or filter them out is a very inefficient, over-engineered and =
non-scalable way to do things.

Best,
Scott Stirling
Workscape, Inc.
